list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: asking for information specifying one or more people or things from a definite set.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: which are the best varieties of grapes for long keeping?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là những loại nho tốt nhất để giữ lâu?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used referring to something previously mentioned when introducing a clause giving further information.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a conference in Vienna which ended on Friday
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hội nghị ở Vienna kết thúc vào thứ Sáu
